ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: With Us there are shackles and a Blazing Fire
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily We shall have fetters with Us, and a roaring furnace,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We have heavy fetters and a blazing Fire in store for them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have prepared for them fetters, flaming fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed We have heavy fetters and a blazing fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, with Us are Ankal, and Jahim.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely with Us are heavy fetters and a flaming fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: for with Us there are fetters, and a furnace,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! with Us are heavy fetters and a raging fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have in store for them heavy fetters and a blazing Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily with us are heavy fetters and Scorch.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed with Us are heavy fetters and a fierce fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: With Us are Fetters (to bind them), and a Fire (to burn them),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, with Us are fetters (to bind them), and a raging Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We have fetters (for them) and a blazing fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: With Us are shackles, and a Fierce Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, with Us [for them] are shackles and burning fire
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [73:12] [For] indeed with Us are heavy fetters (ankāl is the plural of nikl), heavy shackles, and a hell-fire, a scorching Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! with Us) for them in the Hereafter (are heavy fetters) with which their hands will be tied to their necks and chains will also be put around their necks (and a raging fire) which they will enter,
